Title: Adventure Land
Description: Adventure Land is an Adventure game, developed by Adventure Soft and published by Commodore,which was released in 1981.

Title: AE
Description: AE is an Action game, developed and published by Broderbund,which was released in 1982.

Title: Apple Panic
Description: Apple Panic is an Action game, developed by Broderbund and published by Creative Software,which was released in 1982.

Title: Artillery Duel
Description: A two player game of skill and strategy as you try to knock out your enemy's gun emplacement. New random terrains in each battle!

Title: Astroblitz
Description: Astroblitz is an Action game, developed and published by Creative Software,which was released in 1982.

Title: Atlantis
Description: Only you can save the lost city of Atlantis, one of the greatest civilizations man has ever known. You command the three defense posts that guard the skies. As the dreaded Gorgon Fleet descends on Atlantis, you must destroy them, or perish! One or two players can help defend the submerged city of Atlantis. The longer you last, the faster they come. Some enemy ships fly slowly but steadily over Atlantis. Others streak across the sky. Knock out a Bandit Bomber and annihilate its entire Gorgon squad! Blitz them!

Title: Aztec Challenge
Description: Aztec Challenge is an Action game, developed and published by Cosmi,which was released in 1982.

Title: B-1 Nuclear Bomber
Description: B-1 Nuclear Bomber is a Simulation game, developed by Microcomputer Games Inc. and published by Avalon Hill,which was released in 1983.

Title: Baldor's Castle
Description: Baldor's Castle is an Action game, developed and published by Daedalus,which was released in 1983.

Title: Battlezone
Description: From the control panel of the last combat tank on Earth, it's up to you to stop the fleet of automated weapons that is ravaging the countryside. Armed with a radar screen and turret gun, you must search out and destroy these relentless automatons before they destroy your tank.

Title: Buck Rogers: Planet of Zoom
Description: It's the 25th Century. You are Buck Rogers fighting the battle of Planet Zoom. Skillfully slip through zapping electron posts. Dodge and destroy deadly space hoppers and alien saucers. Your race against death has just begun! Prepare for battle with your most powerful enemy... the Mother Ship! It's never easy when it's do or die. You must hit the Mother Ship dead center. Anything less will only waste precious fuel. Aim steady, but hurry... your fuel is dangerously low!

Title: Cannonball Blitz
Description: Cannonball Blitz is an Action game, developed by Sierra Entertainment and published by Sierra Online,which was released in 1982.

Title: Cavern Fighter
Description: Cavern Fighter is an Action game, developed and published by Anirog Software,which was released in 1982.

Title: Centipede
Description: An insidious invasion of multiplying insects (centipedes, jumping spiders, poisonous spiders, and frenzied fleas) pose different perils to the mushroom patch. You must repeatedly blast enraged creepers and stubborn obstacles or lose your enchanted fungus. Remember to listen for the distinctive sounds of the attacking bugs; and watch out for blasted centipede segments, each one grows a new head!

Title: Choplifter
Description: Man a chopper in the nation's top action adventure. Pockets of international hostages are trapped. All across the world. In the Middle East. In the South Seas. And in a secret base somewhere in a cavern. You man a helicopter rescue team. And your job is to take your helicopter down, rescue the hostages and fly them back to safety. All the while dodging and destroying dangerous enemy fire. An action-packed helicopter game at its best!

Title: Cloudburst
Description: Cloudburst is an Action game, developed and published by UMI,which was released in 1982.

Title: Computer War
Description: Computer War is an Action game, developed and published by Thorn EMI,which was released in 1983.

Title: Congo Bongo
Description: You're on a jungle safari packed full of wild and zany adventures. Climb the cliffs to the top of Monkey Mountain as you try to reach the jungle's most mischievous gorilla. Don't get clobbered by the coconuts he'll throw your way. Watch out for menacing monkeys. Beyond Monkey Mountain you'll come to Lazy Lake where you'll see raging rhinos and hollering hippos. Leap from lily pad to lily pad across the treacherous lake filled with ferocious man-eating fish and other jungle dangers, but be careful... one slip and it's safari heaven!

Title: Cosmic Jailbreak
Description: Cosmic Jailbreak is an Action game, developed and published by Commodore,which was released in 1982.

Title: The Count
Description: You wake up in a large brass bed in a castle somewhere in Transylvania. Who are you, what are you doing here, and why did the postman deliver a bottle of blood? It's LOVE AT FIRST BYTE!

Title: Creepy Corridors
Description: Creepy Corridors is an Action Adventure game, developed and published by Sierra Entertainment,which was released in 1982.

Title: Crush, Crumble & Chomp!
Description: Crush, Crumble & Chomp! is an Action game, developed by Automated Simulations and published by Epyx,which was released in 1982.

Title: Dig Dug
Description: Create your own maze as you tunnel fearlessly through the earth. Your goal: Reap tasty vegetables worth healthy points. Your enemies: ghosts who want to bury you alive, fierce fire-breathing dragons, and mean balloon-like bullies! Can you dig it? Here's the exciting home version of the celebrated coin-op original!

Title: Donkey Kong
Description: You can feel an exciting tingle up and down your spine when you play DONKEY KONG at home, just like at an arcade. Your joystick guides Mario,* the fearless carpenter, up the girders and elevators as he attempts to rescue his sweetheart from the clutches of Donkey Kong. All the thrills of the arcade game in a home computer version for one or two players.

Title: Garden Wars
Description: Garden Wars is an Action game, developed and published by Commodore,which was released in 1982.

Title: Gorf
Description: The smash hit Bally Midway arcade game comes to your home video computer system! Featuring four completely different space games: Astro Battles, Laser Attack, Space Warp, and Flagship. This arcade classic will give you hours of space action fun!

Title: Gridrunner
Description: Here's another slick shooter from the developer who is rapidly gaining a reputation as the king of retro on iOS.Gridrunner was a much-loved and popular game on the Commodore Vic-20 and Commodore 64 back in 1982.Here the game is reimagined by its original author in the style of an early 1980s coin-op arcade machine.Of course this is a Minotaur Project game, so we ignore the limitations of such old hardware, borrowing just the style but presenting a slick, modern shooter that is a joy to play on iOS.As can be relied on in a Llamasoft game the controls are excellent and the gameplay fun, satisfying and rewarding.Gridrunner is OpenFeint enabled and supports leaderboards and achievements on both OpenFeint and GameCenter.Get your blasting trousers on and get ready to enjoy some classic shooting fun re-energised for the modern era.Another great Minotaur Project release.

Title: Home Babysitter
Description: Home Babysitter is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Commodore,which was released in 1982.

Title: Hunchback
Description: As the Hunchback, you have been given the mighty task of rescuing Esmerelda from her castle stronghold! Featuring Ramparts, Knights, Arrows, Fireballs, the Pit and of course the Bells! 100% machine code, just like in the arcade!

Title: Lode Runner
Description: You're a highly trained Galactic Commando, deep in enemy territory. Your mission: to recover a fortune in gold, stolen from the Bungeling people by their power-hungry leaders. You'll be running, jumping, and climbing heroically, solving perplexing puzzles. With your laser pistol, you'll drill passageways through stone floors and barriers. To get through this mission alive, you'll need more than fleet feet and good looks. You'll need your quick wits and brains. And more than just a little luck.

Title: Mission: Impossible
Description: Mission: Impossible is an Adventure game, developed by Adventure Soft and published by Commodore,which was released in 1981.

Title: Money Wars
Description: Money Wars is an Action game, developed and published by Commodore,which was released in 1981.

Title: Monster Maze
Description: Monster Maze is an Action game, developed and published by Epyx,which was released in 1983.

Title: Ms. Pac-Man
Description: Meet the queen of video games - Ms. Pac-Man! She's all dressed up - and hungry as ever! Score points as Ms. Pac-Man gobbles up dots, energy pills, fruit, pretzels, and of course, those grumpy ghosts.

Title: Omega Race
Description: The Omegans, the most feared and respected star warriors throughout the galaxy, have come to Earth to challenge you to their legendary OMEGA RACE! Grab hold of your Booster-Grip and speed your Fighter around the perimeters of the mysterious cosmic arena. Ricochet off walls to outmaneuver and vaporize Omegan Droid Ships and Command Ships and avoid the deadly Photon Mines. Endurance, skill and luck are what you'll need to clear the arena and destroy the madly-spinning Death Ship! But don't get too confident, hotshot. The Omegans waste no time in sending new challenges your way. This is one race that never ends!

Title: Pac-Man
Description: Gobble, gobble, gulp! Who's munching Power Pellets? Who's zipping around the maze at top speed, chomping up ghosts and scoring big points? It's Pac-Man, the world's hungriest character! Devour a fruit treat and get a big bonus score. But if you're caught by the little haunters, you're ghostflakes! Use the warp tunnel for a quick escape. Hours of ghost-chomping action!

Title: Pharaoh's Curse
Description: Pharaoh's Curse is an Action game, developed by Human Engineered Software and published by HesWare,which was released in 1983.

Title: Pinball Spectacular
Description: Pinball Spectacular is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Commodore,which was released in 1981.

Title: Pirate Cove
Description: Yo ho ho and a bottle of rum... You'll meet a tough old pirate and his daffy bird, and encounter many strange sights as you attempt to go from your London flat to Treasure Island. Can you find and recover Long John Silver's lost treasures?

Title: Pole Position
Description: Qualify for the Grand Prix and win the Pole Position, the number one starting spot. Then go flat out to beat the track record and finish a winner. Pass cars like they're standing still, but watch those curves! One mistake and you could go up in flames.

Title: Protector
Description: Protector is an Action game, developed by Human Engineered Software and published by HesWare,which was released in 1982.

Title: Q*Bert
Description: Hop Q*bert up and down the steps of a "three-dimensional" pyramid, changing each step's color as he lands. Complete the entire pyramid, and Q*bert moves to a more challenging pyramid. But look out! The crafty arcade creatures are here, too, and they're after Q*bert. Hop out of danger fast - or soar to safety on a flying disc. But watch where you move Q*bert. One hop off the pyramid and he'll be lost in space!

Title: Radar Rat Race
Description: Radar Rat Race is a Driving game, developed and published by Commodore,which was released in 1981.

Title: Raid on Fort Knox
Description: Make your way through the treacherous corridors of Fort Knox... patrolled by deadly panthers! How much gold can you sneak back to your hideout before time runs out? Fast action, increasing levels of difficulty, and colorful, suspenseful, exciting gameplay!

Title: Rescue at Rigel
Description: Rescue at Rigel is an Action Adventure game, developed by Automated Simulations and published by Epyx,which was released in 1980.

Title: River Rescue
Description: River Rescue is an Action game, developed and published by Thorn EMI,which was released in 1982.

Title: Robotron: 2084
Description: In 2084, man creates a species of super-advanced cyborgs known as Robotrons. Recognizing the imperfect nature of their creators, the Robotrons conclude that the inefficient human race must be exterminated. Only you and a single family of clones remain. If mankind is to survive, you must destroy the Grunts, Brains, Enforcers, and Tanks - but avoid the indestructible Hulks at all cost. Can you withstand wave after wave of android invasion... before it's too late?

Title: Sargon II Chess
Description: Introducing one of the most sophisticated computer chess programs ever written! Turns your VIC-20 into a challenging chess partner with seven play levels, board set-up and color options. Includes a "Teach Yourself Chess" instruction manual.

Title: Scorpion
Description: Scorpion is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Commodore and published by Tronix,which was released in 1983.

Title: Sea Wolf
Description: Sea Wolf is an Action game, developed by Midway and published by Commodore,which was released in 1981.

Title: Serpentine
Description: Serpentine is an Action game, developed by Antirom Software and published by Creative Software,which was released in 1982.

Title: Skyblazer
Description: Skyblazer is an Action game, developed and published by Broderbund,which was released in 1983.

Title: Spiders of Mars
Description: Spiders of Mars is an Action game, developed by Tensor Technology, Inc. and published by UMI,which was released in 1982.

Title: Story Machine
Description: Story Machine is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Human Engineered Software and published by HesWare,which was released in 1983.

Title: The Sword of Fargoal
Description: The Sword of Fargoal is a Role-Playing game, developed by Automated Simulations and published by Epyx,which was released in 1982.

Title: Threshold
Description: You're in command of an exploring space attack ship. Be prepared to fire on invading space enemies - you can progress through the galaxy and encounter up to 10 different enemy forces! Be alert for the narrow tunnels that you must fly your ship through. Blast off for a super space adventure from Tigervision!

Title: Turmoil
Description: Turmoil is an Action game, developed and published by Sirius Software,which was released in 1982.

Title: Ultima: Escape from Mt. Drash
Description: Ultima: Escape from Mt. Drash is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by Sierra Online,which was released in 1981.

Title: VIC-20
Description: VIC-20 is a Hardware game, developed and published by Commodore,which was released in Japan in 1980.

Title: VIC-20
Description: VIC-20 is a Hardware game, developed and published by Commodore,which was released in Japan in 1980.

Title: VIC-20
Description: VIC-20 is a Hardware game, developed and published by Commodore,which was released in Japan in 1980.

Title: Voodoo Castle
Description: Count Cristo has had a fiendish curse put on him by his enemies. There he lies, and you're his only hope. Can you rescue him, or is he forever doomed? Beware the Voodoo Man!
